overview: At the construction site, these young men know that all work and no play only makes for very dull boys. And for that reason, these hot and horny worker boys make sure that when they work hard, they also take time to play much harder. While on the job, they spend their day hauling, hammering and nailing. But when it's time for their break, they haul ass hammering and nailing each other with reckless abandon.
title: Boys on Break
